languages.text: "Ох ты ж... либо ты самая тупая ксеносиха на свете, либо храбрее целого полка Имперской гвардии. Скорее всего — и то, и другое одновременно, раз говоришь с {mf|его|ее} благородием Вольным Торговцем в таком тоне!"

"Whoa... you've got to be the dumbest xenos in the galaxy, or you're braver than a whole Imperial Guard regiment. Must be a bit of both, if you're talking to {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} the Rogue Trader in that tone!"
languages.original_text: "Ох ты ж... либо ты самая тупая ксеносиха на свете, либо храбрее целого полка Имперской гвардии. Скорее всего — и то, и другое одновременно, раз говоришь с {mf|его|ее} благородием Вольным Торговцем в таком тоне!"

traits.locale_text: "Whoa... you've got to be the dumbest xenos on the planet, or you're braver than a whole Imperial Guard regiment. Must be a bit of both, if you're talking to {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} the Rogue Trader in that tone!"

"Whoa... you've got to be the dumbest xenos on the planet, or you're braver than a whole Imperial Guard regiment. Must be a bit of both, if you're talking to {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} the Rogue Trader in that tone!"

"Whoa... you've got to be the dumbest xenos on the planet, or you're braver than a whole Imperial Guard regiment. Must be a bit of both, if you're talking to {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} the Rogue Trader in that tone!"

"Whoa... you've got to be the dumbest xenos in the galaxy, or you're braver than a whole Imperial Guard regiment. Must be a bit of both, if you're talking to {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} the Rogue Trader in that tone!"

languages.text: “哇啊……要么你是整个银河系里最愚蠢的异形，要么你比整支帝国卫队还要更加勇敢。既然你敢用这种语气对行商浪人{mf|大人|大人}说话，那你肯定是两者都有一点儿。”
languages.original_text: "Whoa... you've got to be the dumbest xenos in the galaxy, or you're braver than a whole Imperial Guard regiment. Must be a bit of both, if you're talking to {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} the Rogue Trader in that tone!"

traits.locale_text: “哇啊……要么你是整个银河系里最愚蠢的异形，要么你比整支帝国卫队还要更加勇敢。既然你敢用这种语气对行商浪人{mf|大人|大人}说话，那你肯定是两者都有一点儿。”

languages.text: «Increíble... o eres la xenos más tonta de la galaxia o eres más valiente que un regimiento de la Guardia Imperial. ¡Un poco de ambas, para hablar a mi{mf|lord|lady} {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente en ese tono!».
languages.original_text: "Whoa... you've got to be the dumbest xenos in the galaxy, or you're braver than a whole Imperial Guard regiment. Must be a bit of both, if you're talking to {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} the Rogue Trader in that tone!"

traits.locale_text: «Increíble... o eres la xenos más tonta de la galaxia o eres más valiente que un regimiento de la Guardia Imperial. ¡Un poco de ambas, para hablar a mi{mf|lord|lady} {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente en ese tono!».

languages.text: 「落ち着きなよ…あんたって銀河一おバカな異種族か、それとも帝国防衛軍連隊全体よりも勇敢かだね。そんな口調で自由開拓者である陛下とお話ししてるんだから、その両方か！」
languages.original_text: "Whoa... you've got to be the dumbest xenos in the galaxy, or you're braver than a whole Imperial Guard regiment. Must be a bit of both, if you're talking to {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} the Rogue Trader in that tone!"

traits.locale_text: 「落ち着きなよ…あんたって銀河一おバカな異種族か、それとも帝国防衛軍連隊全体よりも勇敢かだね。そんな口調で自由開拓者である陛下とお話ししてるんだから、その両方か！」

languages.text: "Hey ... ihr seid entweder die dümmste Xenos in der Galaxie oder tapferer als ein ganzes Regiment der imperialen Armee. Wahrscheinlich beides, wenn Ihr in diesem Ton mit {mf|seiner Lordschaft, dem Freihändler,|ihrer Ladyschaft, der Freihändlerin,} sprecht!"
languages.original_text: "Whoa... you've got to be the dumbest xenos in the galaxy, or you're braver than a whole Imperial Guard regiment. Must be a bit of both, if you're talking to {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} the Rogue Trader in that tone!"

traits.locale_text: "Hey ... ihr seid entweder die dümmste Xenos in der Galaxie oder tapferer als ein ganzes Regiment der imperialen Armee. Wahrscheinlich beides, wenn Ihr in diesem Ton mit {mf|seiner Lordschaft, dem Freihändler,|ihrer Ladyschaft, der Freihändlerin,} sprecht!"

languages.text: « Eh ben... Soit vous êtes la xénos la plus stupide de la galaxie, soit vous avez plus de courage qu'un régiment entier de la Garde Impériale. Sûrement les deux, en fait, pour parler à Sa Seigneurie {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} sur ce ton ! »
languages.original_text: "Whoa... you've got to be the dumbest xenos in the galaxy, or you're braver than a whole Imperial Guard regiment. Must be a bit of both, if you're talking to {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} the Rogue Trader in that tone!"

traits.locale_text: « Eh ben... Soit vous êtes la xénos la plus stupide de la galaxie, soit vous avez plus de courage qu'un régiment entier de la Garde Impériale. Sûrement les deux, en fait, pour parler à Sa Seigneurie {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} sur ce ton ! »

languages.original_text: "Whoa... you've got to be the dumbest xenos in the galaxy, or you're braver than a whole Imperial Guard regiment. Must be a bit of both, if you're talking to {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} the Rogue Trader in that tone!"

languages.text: "Üf! Ya galaksideki en aptal zenosun ya da komple bir İmparatorluk Muhafızı bölüğünün toplamından daha cesursun. Hür Tacir {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ile bu ses tonuyla konuşuyorsan ikisinden de biraz olmalı!"
languages.original_text: "Whoa... you've got to be the dumbest xenos in the galaxy, or you're braver than a whole Imperial Guard regiment. Must be a bit of both, if you're talking to {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} the Rogue Trader in that tone!"

traits.locale_text: "Üf! Ya galaksideki en aptal zenosun ya da komple bir İmparatorluk Muhafızı bölüğünün toplamından daha cesursun. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri Hür Tacir ile bu ses tonuyla konuşuyorsan ikisinden de biraz olmalı!"
